name: Out of Water: Plenty More Fish in the Sea
name_original: Out of Water: Plenty More Fish in the Sea
description:
The Team

Daniel Moss - Programming, Design, Music

Gameghoul - Art, Animation

Sercan Sokmen - API Programming

Controls

We strongly recommend using a gamepad:

ActionGamepadKeyboard/MouseMoveLeft AnalogueWASD
JumpSouth Face ButtonSpacebarCharge (Hold)East Face ButtonLeft ControlDive (Release/Airborn/Moving)East Face ButtonLeft ControlHoming Attack (Airborn)West Face ButtonQRecenter CameraLeft TriggerTab Details:

Oh no! You've been isekai-d into a world where you are an adorable fish girl senpai!

Out of Water is heavily inspired by the early 3D Sonic games, and was designed around the theme of "Cliché" for Game Off 22. We focused on fish based puns/idioms and aimed for a general japanese/anime aesthetic with the cartoony main character feeling out of place (OUT OF WATER?) in the relatively grounded environment.

We have fish in barrels that shoot, a harem of fish boys vying for fish girl senpai's attention, toast being held in her mouth which she runs to make it to school on time, and a bunch more clichés for your playing pleasure... including, a definitely not Crush 40 rip-off soundtrack from the hit band Squeeze 39 (also known as, me screaming in my room with a guitar, bass and some filters)

We hope you enjoy our silly little fish game!

For more details and our source code, check out our repo here: https://github.com/DanMossDev/game-off-22
